bdy.p: MGL – Mascon Global Limited, a global provider of technology services, was found in 1981. The company has around 14 offices and development centers across Americas, Europe, Asia and Australia. Staffed with over 4,000 professionals,MGL has successfully completed numerous projects involving thousands of person-years of effort.

sec.p: Since its inception in 1981, Mascon Global Limited (MGL) has grown, through organic and inorganic processes, to be known as a global provider of technology services with offices and software development centers across USA, Mexico, Europe, and Asia. For the past 26 years, MGL has been the innovation partner of choice for blue-chip firms around the world, ranging from large Fortune 500 companies to start-ups.

MGL's quality-based global delivery methodologies have given clients the competitive edge to excel in their industries and also augmented the organization's drive towards achieving ISO 7001, TL 9000, PCMM level 3 and SEI-CMMI level 5 certifications which are testimony of the company's thrust in quality and innovation.

Having gained a reputation for providing value-chain driven professional services, we use our expertise to deliver world-class technology solutions across multiple industries and hold leadership positions in the worlds of Healthcare and Life Sciences, Telecommunications, Manufacturing, and Finance, along with our new growth platforms – Digital Media and Travel and Hospitality.

At MGL, we believe in shifting our business paradigms to suit the nature of clients' expectations and this has enabled our horizontal expertise to include Web Solutions, Package Implementation, Identity Management, Life-cycle Management, Testing and Compliance, Infrastructure Management and Strategic Consulting.

ss1.st: MGL provide services across various industries

ss1.p: MGL’s corporate web site is www.mgl.com

MGL has multiple development centers across the world to ensure our products are delivered on time and relevant to the needs of our clients, wherever they may be. With such a diverse presence, MGL has evolved into a global leader with offices across four continents:

Continuous learning and skill enhancement of our employees are given importance since these are prime areas of focus for MGL’s human resource department. With an in-house training center called the Competency Development Center (CDC), MGL looks to deliver high-class training to our associates in the new and emerging areas of technology. The various forms of training include seminars, conference tutorials and workshops, classroom training, mentoring, and laboratories.

MGL Finance delivers a comprehensive mix of services and solutions, both custom-built and packaged offerings for a range of firms. Our solutions address the key concerns of the world’s leading financial services firms, including tier one banks, asset managers, wealth managers, hedge funds, and insurance companies.

Life Insurance and Annuities: Our solutions have achieved recognition in the insurance industry for taking control of automating front-end paperwork, business analysis, and application integration, in a way that is custom-tailored to client needs. MGL also provides casualty and property insurance services.

MGL has created a new practice that attempts to bring Life Sciences and Healthcare under a common framework of providing better patient care as an end objective. Our products in this domain include Electronic Health Record (EHR), Laboratory Information System (LIS), Radiology Information System (RIS), Picture Archival Communication System (PACS), Hospital Information System (HIS), and EXOME, a proprietary Sequence Analysis Tool.

MGL’s service offerings are geared to the manufacturing industry's need for enterprise-wide solutions that enable business stability, growth, and excellence. With a rich history of serving the Plastics industry for more than two decades, MGL has partnered with SAP to offer EZ Plastic - A tightly integrated Plastics industry specific business solution built on SAP ERP.

MGL has been providing end-to-end IT solutions to the travel and hospitality industry and offers the following solutions as part of new venture into the Propriety Distribution and Market Intelligence Solutions platform: o VerityRM o ServizConnect o GuestSalute o VerityRank

The Communication Technologies business unit of MGL provides end-to-end solutions and services for wireless, wireline and IP networks. MGL helps telecom equipment manufacturers, service providers and system integrators across the globe in development, sustenance and enhancement of their solutions. MGL has offered two products in this domain - MGL Test Orchestrator (MATEO) and AVANZAR-Diameter.

MGL's expertise and knowledge in this domain provides its clients with the single solution for all their Media and Publishing needs. With a good onsite team to ensure knowledge continuity and proactive delivery to the business, offshore team capabilities are leveraged to deliver a variety of application management and development services.

MGL identified Product Engineering Services as a focus area having built strong partnerships with commercial grade software service providers across various domains. The relationships that MGL builds with clients are transformational in nature and go beyond the cost arbitrage and contextual partnering rationale. MGL's core strength comes from the ability to continuously innovate and tailor our engagement model to client requirements.

From network management to technical support, each IT segment is beset with problems that can impact functioning of businesses. With MGL's infrastructure management services, these issues can be resolved by taking advantage of its varied experience and best practices. MGL's expertise lies in improving quality of infrastructure while bearing in mind the need to adapt to changing business dynamics and customer demands.

MGL's expertise in providing Identity Management solutions is reflected by a successful track record implementing Sun IDM solutions. With MGL's compliance demands and quality-based onshore/offshore resource pool, MGL has been selected as Sun IDM Center of Excellence (COE) for multiple Fortune 100 clients. As part of this, MGL also adopts an unique approach to Information Security and Risk Management and offers a holistic approach to unify traditional silos of Security for Network and Infrastructure, Application, SOA and Enterprise Identity and Access Management.

MGL provides experienced consulting services to assist clients with Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and Supply Chain Management (SCM)solutions. MGL's seasoned professionals provide complete project lifecycle assistance, including project planning, requirements definition, gap analysis, configuration, system testing, end-user training, database administration, interface/conversion/report programming, and go-live and support services.

MGL's Business Intelligence(BI) capabilities provide clients the ability to respond quickly to new requirements and also to reduce overall cost of data integration. MGL's BI systems facilitate transformation of an organization's ability to convert raw data into information that can revolutionize the way their businesses run. MGL's BI service offerings minimize its clients' investments while maximizing their returns.
For more information visit us at : www.mgl.com

sec.st: About MGL Chairman - Mr. Sandy K. Chandra
sec.p: Mr. Sandy K. Chandra, also affectionately called Sandy, is the Chairman and CEO of (MGL) Mascon Global Limited worldwide.

One of the first few IIT-ians to have actually worked in the technology discipline in early 70's, Sandy began his career with ABB Lummus Crest in the US and worked there for 18 years in various capacities, eventually going on to head it's operations in India. In 1981, he also became one of the founding investors of MGL and became responsible for shifting the company's focus towards the manufacturing sector.

Sandy formally joined the MGL board in the year 2000 and in 2003 when he was appointed the Chairman and CEO of the company, sold or pledged all of his assets to turnaround the company that was almost written off. He is credited with single-handedly guiding his team in transforming the company's financial and operational effectiveness, post the Dot Com crash and a slowdown in the IT sector.Under his stewardship, MGL has registered an impressive 500% growth since 2004 in revenues and a consistent growth in profitability. A feat achieved through his single-minded dedication to putting MGL on the global map and a thorough adherence to innovation and quality.

Today under his leadership, MGL develops and implements end-to-end IT solutions for clients, ranging from Fortune 500 companies to startups, in seven different industry segments. He is the brain behind company's mantra to become an IP-led growth company that will achieve a billion dollars in revenue by 2010 (1BY10 is the nick name for this ambition of MGL).

With a penchant for the finer things crafted by skilled hands, Mr. Chandra is also an avid art collector. Widely traveled across the globe, he spends his time, shuttling between his India office and his offices spread across geographies.

Sandy holds a Bachelor of Technology degree in Chemical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Madras and a Master of Business Administration degree from Rutgers University in United States (1976).
